Question
========

You buy 10 lottery tickets for €1 each. With each lottery ticket you have a chance of 0.06 to win €10. If you take into account the cost of the lottery tickets, what is your expected profit?

Answerlist
----------

* € 100
* € 90
* € 6
* € 4

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* € 100: Incorrect
* 90 €: Incorrect
* 6 €: Incorrect
* € 4: Correct
